assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en: The course overviews ancient Egyptian, Greek, and Roman art. The most important types of art, works, and features characteristic of different styles are discussed.
description.et: Kursus annab ülevaate Vana-Egiptuse, -Kreeka ja -Rooma kunstist. Käsitletakse olulisemaid kunstiliike, teoseid ja erinevatele stiilidele omaseid jooni.

objectives.en: - acquire a systematic knowledge of ancient art
- learn to relate works of art and architecture to the political, social and economic life in which they were created and used.
objectives.et: Õppida seostama kunstiteoseid ja arhitektuuri poliitilise, sotsiaalse ja majanduseluga, milles need loodud ja kasutatud.

objectives.en: - you acquire the skill to recognize the influences of ancient art in the later history of art
objectives.et: Omandad vilumus tunda ära antiikkunsti mõjusid hilisemas kunstiloos.

learning_outcomes.en: A student that completes the course:
- has an overview of ancient Egyptian, Greek and Italian art and its various forms of expression
learning_outcomes.et: - omab ülevaadet Vana-Egiptuse, -Kreeka ja -Itaalia kunstist ja selle erinevatest väljendusvormidest

learning_outcomes.en: - knows how to use databases and sources
- sees and can create connections between the past and the present
learning_outcomes.et: - näeb ja oskab luua seoseid mineviku ja oleviku vahel

learning_outcomes.en: -has some insight into ancient art research methods and have honed their research, writing and presentation skills
learning_outcomes.et: -omab mõningast ülevaadet antiikkunsti uurimismeetoditest ja on lihvinud oma uurimis-, kirjutamis- ja esinemisoskust
